alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 9:54PM CDT until May 07 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN NUCKOLLS AND SOUTHERN THAYER COUNTIES... At 953 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Byron, or 14 miles north of Belleville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. A couple of reports between 55 and 60 mph were observed near Ruskin and Chester with this thunderstorm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Chester around 1000 PM CDT. Hubbell around 1010 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
